name: Paint Bar x Aisle | Singles Mixer
description:
Join us for a fun Paint Party + Singles Mixer in association with Aisle \-
where you paint with like-minded singles! Unwind and get creative with easy-
to-follow instructions and all painting supplies provided. Perfect for
beginners or experienced painters alike. Enjoy an afternoon of cocktails,
colours and conversations with interesting singles like you.

6th Block, Koramangala, Bengaluru, Karnataka 560095

name: Tulip Fields at Roastea, Koramangla
description:

Whether you're a beginner or a seasoned painter, you'll create your own
vibrant masterpiece using acrylic paints on canvas. Our team will guide you

name: Fluid Art X Pickleball with Ferrohub Sports
